message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product which I believe would be very valuable to you. I'm asking for $14,000. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and split the difference.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product's value to me is quite significant.  How about we meet closer to the middle at $13,750?
I appreciate your revised offer, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $13,200?
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $13,500.  I believe this is a fair price that reflects the true value of the product.
I understand your perspective, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $13,000?
